name: ACS UI Library Design Kit
description:
This kit includes components, composites, and UX guidance purpose-built to help bring your video calling and chat experiences to life. The components and composites are the same offered in the Azure Communication Services UI Library.  

 

Have ideas for how to improve this design kit? Weâ€™d love to hear from you. Fill out our feedback form. You can also report an issue on Github. 

 

--- 

 

Azure Communication Services is a cloud-based communications service that makes it simple to add calling, chat, and SMS to your apps.
